attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for anyone to deliberately unleash a dog in a public place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many people walk their dogs without putting them on a lead. This often results in confrontations with other dogs and, in some high profile cases, children being attacked. Leads are not expensive and those who refuse to control their dogs are needlessly endangering other dogs and children. We ask the government to create severe fines for these people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
